title: Cucurbitacin D Induces Apoptotic Cell Death via NOX4 and Overcomes Radioresistance in Colorectal Cancer.
abstract: Colorectal cancer (CRC) incidence is a significant cancer globally, and radiotherapy resistance is a serious problem. Cucurbitacin D (CBD), extracted from many plants such as the tubers of
